Contact Us



Whether you're planning a visit to the Cornish coast, have a question about our menu, or just want to say hello, we'd love to hear from you!

The team at Silas Cove is always happy to help, whether it's booking a table, organising a special celebration, or checking if we've still got your favourite drink on tap (we probably do).

You can reach us by phone or email, whichever suits you best. If we don't answer straight away, we're likely serving cocktails or chasing seagulls off the terrace, but we'll get back to you as soon as we can.

Got something on your mind? A quirky request? A lost flip-flop? Don't be shy, pop us a message and we'll do our best to help.

We're here, rain or shine, and always up for a chat. Speak soon!
